name: cookie-consent-banner
author: Glen Fonceca
preview: A fully GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner with customizable text, accept/reject buttons, and granular preference management. Features include persistent storage, accessibility support, and framework-agnostic design.

props.name: title
props.description: Main title text of the banner

props.name: description
props.default: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience...

props.name: onAccept
props.description: Callback function when user accepts cookies

props.name: onReject
props.description: Callback function when user rejects cookies

props.name: onPreferencesSave
props.description: Callback function when user saves custom preferences

props.name: cookieName
props.description: Name of the cookie to store consent

props.name: expiryDays
props.description: Number of days before consent expires
